aima.core.search.framework

Interface Search

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AStarSearch, BestFirstSearch, BidirectionalSearch, BreadthFirstSearch, DepthFirstSearch, DepthLimitedSearch, GreedyBestFirstSearch, HillClimbingSearch, IterativeDeepeningSearch, PrioritySearch, RecursiveBestFirstSearch, SimulatedAnnealingSearch, UniformCostSearch

    public interface Search
    Author:
    Ravi Mohan, Mike Stampone

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Metrics getMetrics()
      Returns all the metrics of the search.
      java.util.List<Action> search(Problem p)
      Returns a list of actions to the goal if the goal was found, a list containing a single NoOp Action if already at the goal, or an empty list if the goal could not be found.

    • Method Detail

      • search

        java.util.List<Action> search(Problem p)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns a list of actions to the goal if the goal was found, a list containing a single NoOp Action if already at the goal, or an empty list if the goal could not be found.
        Parameters:
        p - the search problem
        Returns:
        a list of actions to the goal if the goal was found, a list containing a single NoOp Action if already at the goal, or an empty list if the goal could not be found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getMetrics

        Metrics getMetrics()
        Returns all the metrics of the search.
        Returns:
        all the metrics of the search.
